name: Amazing Run
description:
I am the last stickman. I live and hide in an ancient temple on a rocky mountain. One morning, a black hawk suddenly stole the chicken leg on my hand. Immediately, I ran on top of the temple, followed the black hawk and tried to take back my only meal…. I was so hungry

- From the maker of Amazing Brick, Amazing Thief, Spring Ninja, 2 Cars and Captain Rocket -
